Title: Parallel algorithms for multi-source BFS and its applications
Diameter calculation in Incremental graphs
Potential Applications: Real world networks are incremental graphs and the diameter computation helps us to know the development of network with time.Ex:-Facebook can be visualized as a graph where every node is a person and edge between two persons indicate whether they are friends and this graph is an incremental graph as we can unfriend a person in facebook due to which the edge between those two persons will be deleted.
